analysis: The documents primarily concern the establishment, modification, continuation, or termination of Presidential advisory committees, commissions, boards, and councils. These entities are created to advise the President on various issues, ranging from science and technology to education policy, cost reduction, antitrust laws, and ethical problems in medicine. Many of the orders reference and adhere to the Federal Advisory Committee Act. The documents also cover specific topics like US-Liberian relations, the BP Deepwater Horizon oil spill, and broadcasting to Cuba.
title: Presidential Advisory Groups
